title: Black Love Matters
description:
Kerry-Anne and Michael Gordon had a big wedding planned for this spring. Then everything got scrapped. When they finally figured out how to pull off a small ceremony in Philadelphia, they ran into the largest protest in the city’s history… and Kerry-Anne and Michael became a part of history.

Follow Kerry-Anne and Michael on Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
